casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Wilson, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Wilson, 127 Ohio St.3d 406, 2010-Ohio-6285.]

(No. 2010-1257 Submitted October 12, 2010 Decided December 28, 2010.) William D. Mason, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Katherine Mullin, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The discretionary appeal is accepted.

{¶ 2} The judgment of the court of appeals is reversed on the authority of State v. Saxon, 109 Ohio St.3d 176, 2006-Ohio-1245, 846 N.E.2d 824.

Brown, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Lanzinger, J., dissents.
